name: ABC!
description:
In ‘Anything But Chores!’ you take the role of a child who has been tasked with helping to clean around the house. But since cleaning up isn’t one of the most fun tasks, the child imagines that the floor is lava! Are you able to clean up everything without touching the floor? You are allowed to make an even greater mess to clean up your toys ;) Your goals are :
  • Tidy up your toys that are lying all around, pick up your toys, and throw them in the corresponding chest.
  • Clean up the dirty floor, click on dirty spots to clean them
Controls :
  • Primary click to pick up an object when your cursor is green
  • Secondary click to throw the object you are carrying
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Q, E to use your powers.
  • Space to jump
  • Remappable in options!

This prototype was made during the Ready Player 42 hackathon. However we will continue working on this project since we’ve had a lot of fun with it so far.
By team Anything But Chores!
Fabien Abbenbroek
Louis Renuart
